title: Software Engineering Co-op
description: Automated data pipeline in Python that queried Oracle databases, manipulated log data with pandas, and visualized data trends in a dashboard for stakeholders. Increased yearly productivity by 98% across multiple teams. Led the provisioning of a Linux-based virtual machine to execute the Python scripts on a set schedule.

title: Software Development Intern
description: Developed an OAuth admin portal using Angular that interacted with existing internal authentication service to manage creating clients and distributing access tokens. Upgraded framework from AngularJS to Angular 6 and optimized asynchronous data retrieval and rendering, resulting in a 66% performance increase when compared to the legacy admin portal.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Implemented feature changes in Java and maintained test suites (unit, integration, end-to-end) for customer-facing authentication service serving 70 million monthly active users. Collaborated closely in cross-functional team to deliver new feature that was used by over 100,000 end users during its release month. Reduced team's implementation timeline by 40% by updating outdated documentation, enabling the team to work more efficiently and effectively in delivering project outcomes on-time.
